name: Crowne Plaza Stratford upon Avon
description: A stunning riverside location in the heart of Shakespeare's country, offering modern conference facilities with historic charm.
facilities: Multiple conference rooms and breakout spaces
Climate control in all meeting rooms
accessibility: Hearing loop systems in main conference rooms

transport.car: Located just off the M40 motorway, approximately 2 hours from London and 1 hour from Birmingham. Postcode CV37 6YR for satellite navigation.
transport.train: Stratford-upon-Avon railway station is 0.5 miles away (10-minute walk). Direct services from Birmingham, London Marylebone, and Oxford.
transport.plane: Birmingham Airport (BHX) is 25 miles away (40-minute drive). Heathrow Airport is 90 miles away (2-hour drive).
transport.bus: Regular bus services from Warwick, Leamington Spa, and surrounding areas. Bus stop located 200 yards from the hotel.
